doc.title: Node (networking)

value.content: In networking, a node is a connection point in the network. In physical networks, a node is usually a device, like a computer or a router.

value.title: See also
value.content: • Node on Wikipedia

doc.summary: In networking, a node is a connection point in the network. In physical networks, a node is usually a device, like a computer or a router.
